entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
